entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 except zero in a few localities.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8 except zero in a few localities. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 8:14 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:14 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
